home.aboutText: Since 1946, Le Café du Marché has been delighting the people of Nantes with generous, homemade cuisine. Paul and Matthias carry on this tradition with passion — fresh market produce, a terrine served at the table to your heart's content, and the kind of welcome that makes you feel right at home.
